sentences.en: " Dolphin, " the old man said aloud.
sentences.cn: “ 鲯鳅, " 老人说出声来.

sentences.en: " What an excellent fish dolphin is to eat cooked, " he said.
sentences.cn: " 鲯鳅煮熟了吃味道多鲜美啊, " 他说.

sentences.en: A dolphin leapt out of the water.
sentences.cn: 海豚跃出水面。

sentences.en: A hovering mar - of - war bird showed him where dolphin were chasing some flying fish.
sentences.cn: 一只盘旋的军舰鸟给他指明了海豚追逐飞鱼的地方.

sentences.en: a school of dolphins
sentences.cn: 一群海豚

sentences.en: Ben clicks, looks to me like once every half second, whereas a dolphin is actually making 900 clicks per second.
sentences.cn: 我感觉本每过半秒就会发出一次‘咔哒'声，而海豚事实上每秒就发出了900次‘咔哒'声。

sentences.en: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.cn: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.en: Daniel: Yes, like a dolphin.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔: 嗯，像海豚一样。

sentences.en: He was so happy communing with the dolphin in Dingle Bay.
sentences.cn: 他在丁格尔湾与海豚交流的时候特别开心。

sentences.en: I don't think I can get anything but a dolphin here.
sentences.cn: 我看这儿除了鲯鳅,也逮不到什么别的东西.

sentences.en: I like dolphin.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢海豚。

sentences.en: I was lucky to get him instead of dolphin.
sentences.cn: 我幸而捉到的是他,不是海豚.

sentences.en: I would be a dolphin because dolphins are intelligent creatures, and they have lots of fun.
sentences.cn: 我会做海豚,因为海豚是聪明的动物, 而且很有趣.

sentences.en: It is a big school of dolphin, he thought.
sentences.cn: 这群鲯鳅真大啊, 他想.

sentences.en: The advert featured a dolphin swimming around a goldfish bowl.
sentences.cn: 该广告的內容为一条在金鱼缸里游动的海豚.

sentences.en: The dolphin looks green of course because he is really golden.
sentences.cn: 鲯鳅在水里当然看上去是绿色的,因为它们实在是金黄色的.

sentences.en: The symbols of Apollo were the wolf, swan, raven, stag, dolphin, laurel, and lyre.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗的象征物是狼 、 天鹅 、 渡鸦 、 雄鹿 、 海豚 、 桂冠和竖琴.

sentences.en: The whale, like the dolphin, has become a symbol of the marvels of creation.
sentences.cn: 鲸和海豚一样，已经成为造物杰作的象征。

sentences.en: Tomorrow I will eat the dolphin.
sentences.cn: 明天我将吃那条鲯鳅.

sentences.en: What is the difference between a dolphin and porpoise ?
sentences.cn: 海豚和和鼠海豚有什么区别？

trans.tran_en: a very intelligent sea animal like a fish with a long grey pointed nose
